interface.name: AUT_BasicFieldsSection
interface.definition: load( local!textField, local!paragraphField, local!encryptedTextField, local!integerField, local!decimalField, local!barcodeField, local!maksedBarcodeField, local!dateField, local!datetimeField, local!DropdownField, local!multipleDropdownField, local!dropdownFieldWithSearch, local!multipleDropdownFieldWithSearch, local!radioField, local!radioFieldCardsStyle, local!checkboxField, local!checkboxFieldCardsStyle, local!fileUploadField, local!multipleFileUploadField, local!buttonWithTooltipToggle: fn!false(), local!buttonWithLoadingIndicator: fn!false(), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Basic Fields", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "TextField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!textField, saveInto: local!textField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "ROTextField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!textField, saveInto: local!textField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "ParagraphField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!paragraphField, saveInto: local!paragraphField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", height: "MEDIUM", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "ROParagraphField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!paragraphField, saveInto: local!paragraphField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", height: "MEDIUM", readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_encryptedTextField"( label: "EncryptedTextField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!encryptedTextField, saveInto: local!encryptedTextField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_encryptedTextField"( label: "ROEncryptedTextField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!encryptedTextField, saveInto: local!encryptedTextField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "IntegerField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!integerField, saveInto: local!integerField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "ROIntegerField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!integerField, saveInto: local!integerField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: "DecimalField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!decimalField, saveInto: local!decimalField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: "RODecimalField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!decimalField, saveInto: local!decimalField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_barcodeField"( label: "BarcodeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!barcodeField, saveInto: local!barcodeField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_barcodeField"( label: "ROBarcodeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!barcodeField, saveInto: local!barcodeField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_barcodeField"( label: "MaskedBarcodeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!maksedBarcodeField, saveInto: local!maksedBarcodeField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", masked: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_barcodeField"( label: "ROMaskedBarcodeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!maksedBarcodeField, saveInto: local!maksedBarcodeField, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", readOnly: true, masked: true, validations: {} ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "DateField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!dateField, saveInto: local!dateField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "RODateField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!dateField, saveInto: local!dateField, readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "DatetimeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!datetimeField, saveInto: local!datetimeField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "RODatetimeField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!datetimeField, saveInto: local!datetimeField, readOnly: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "DropdownField", labelPosition: "", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: { "Option, 1", "Option 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, value: local!DropdownField, saveInto: local!DropdownField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField"( label: "MultipleDropdownField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: { "Option 1", "Option 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, value: local!multipleDropdownField, saveInto: local!multipleDropdownField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"( choiceLabels: { "DropdownSearchBoxOption 1", "DropdownSearchBoxOption 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, label: "SearchBoxDropdownField", labelPosition: "", placeholder: "--- Select a Value ---", value: local!dropdownFieldWithSearch, saveInto: local!dropdownFieldWithSearch, searchDisplay: "ON", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"( choiceLabels: { "MultipleDropdownSearchBoxOption 1", "MultipleDropdownSearchBoxOption 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, label: "SearchBoxMultipleDropdownField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: local!multipleDropdownFieldWithSearch, saveInto: local!multipleDropdownFieldWithSearch, searchDisplay: "ON", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "RadioField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: { "Option 1", "Option 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, value: local!radioField, saveInto: local!radioField, choiceLayout: "STACKED", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "CardsStyleRadioField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: { "Option 3", "Option 4" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, value: local!radioFieldCardsStyle, saveInto: local!radioFieldCardsStyle, choiceLayout: "STACKED", choiceStyle: "CARDS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"( label: "CheckboxField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: { "Option 1", "Option 2" }, choiceValues: { 1, 2 }, value: local!checkboxField, saveInto: local!checkboxField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"( label: "CardsStyleCheckboxField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: {"Option 3", "Option 4"}, choiceValues: {1, 2}, value: local!checkboxFieldCardsStyle, saveInto: local!checkboxFieldCardsStyle, choiceStyle: "CARDS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField"( label: "FileUploadField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", target: #"_a-0001dbef-826b-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_56540", value: local!fileUploadField, saveInto: local!fileUploadField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField_v1"( label: "MultipleFileUploadField", labelPosition: "ABOVE", target: #"_a-0001dbef-826b-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_56540", value: local!multipleFileUploadField, saveInto: local!multipleFileUploadField, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "buttonWithTooltipClicked", value: fn!if(local!buttonWithTooltipToggle, "clicked", "not clicked"), readOnly: fn!true() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "buttonWithLoadingIndicatorClicked", value: fn!if(local!buttonWithLoadingIndicator, "clicked", "not clicked"), readOnly: fn!true() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"( label: "Enabled", color: "#cc0000", disabled: fn!false() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: "Disabled", disabled: fn!true() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"( label: "BtnWithTooltip", tooltip: "my button tooltip", saveInto: a!save(local!buttonWithTooltipToggle, fn!true()), style: "SOLID", color: "#cc0000" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: "BtnWithLoadingIndicator", saveInto: a!save(local!buttonWithLoadingIndicator, fn!true()), loadingIndicator: fn!true() ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( label: "EmptyRichTextField" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"( label: "TagField", tags: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem"( text: "Silver Member", backgroundColor: "#aaa9ad", textColor: "#ffffff", recordLink: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem"( text: "Corporate Partner", backgroundColor: "#990099" ) }, size: "STANDARD" ) }, isCollapsible: true ) )
